main

Interface MappingStrategyInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GeneticMapping, ListMapping, RandomMapping

    public interface MappingStrategyInterface
    Is the interface for all the custom mapping algorithms defined in the mapping_strategies package. Every mapping strategy must implement this interface.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getReadableRepresentation() 
      void initialize(MappingEvaluator eval, javax.swing.JProgressBar progressBar)
      Initializes the mapping algorithm with a mapping evaluator object that is used to compare different mapping solutions and a progressBar that is used to display the state of progress of the optimization phase.
      MappingSolution map(Application app, NoCarchitecture arch)
      Finds the best mapping solution given a certain application and NoC architecture

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        void initialize(MappingEvaluator eval,
              javax.swing.JProgressBar progressBar)
        Initializes the mapping algorithm with a mapping evaluator object that is used to compare different mapping solutions and a progressBar that is used to display the state of progress of the optimization phase.
        Parameters:
        eval - The mapping evaluator
        progressBar - The component that visually displays the progress of the optimization task.

      • map

        MappingSolution map(Application app,
                  NoCarchitecture arch)
        Finds the best mapping solution given a certain application and NoC architecture
        Parameters:
        app - The application
        arch - The architecture
        Returns:
        The mapping solution

      • getReadableRepresentation

        java.lang.String getReadableRepresentation()
        Returns:
        a String object containing a formatted representations of the optimization data.
